description: Light-blue Dad fit jeans from BDG cut in a relaxed fit with a slightly tapered leg that's cropped to the ankle. This classic dad jean is available in multiple washes in 100% cotton BDG denim.
Pullover crew neck sweatshirt by Champion in the brand’s signature reverse weave fabrication. Topped with logo accents. Classic silhouette and finished with ribbed knit trims.
New go-to slim fit hoodie from Kith. Cut in a tight, boxy fit that hits at the waist. Loose at sleeves and an perfectly-sized hood. Finished with sand brown thread throughout the hoodie.
Worn-in flannel from BDG. Relaxed and oversized fit with a pointed collar and a button placket at the front. Finished with subtle distressing at the seams and hem. Waka Outfitters exclusive.
Classic CT70 sneakers by Converse and CDG in a high top silhouette with lace up closure. Canvas upper finished with textured tread at the rubber sole.
OutKast t-shirt dress with a Ms. Jackson graphic at the front. Cotton construction fits oversized with dropped short sleeves and a ribbed crew neck.
Authentic vintage piece, handpicked from around the world. One-of-a-Kind Vintage styles are singularly circular, extending the lifecycle of clothing one collectible piece at a time.
The Kith White Box Logo Tee released as part of the spring summer collection in 2019.
Black Dad fit jeans from BDG cut in a relaxed fit with a slightly tapered leg that's cropped to the ankle. This classic dad jean is available in multiple washes in 100% cotton BDG denim.
Oversized Pink Floyd Tee. Subtle distress and a relaxed fit. Vintage piece only available at Waka Outfitters.
Pullover crew neck sweatshirt, only at Urban Outfitters. Topped with a retro stripe pattern and finished with contrast ribbed knit trims.

Essential skate jean from BDG in a '90s-inspired silhouette. Available in multiple washes, these loose, relaxed fit jeans are made with 100% cotton BDG denim. Cut with a higher rise waist and wide leg openings, this throwback style features a classic 5-pocket styling and BDG denim logo patch at the back. Only at Waka Outfitters.
Get bundled up in this soft checkered scarf from Waka Outfitters with a cozy construction that's perfect for cold-weather layering. Topped with a logo patch and finished with tassel fringe trims.

The 57/40 approaches 574’s hybrid concept with new design developments and perspective on an iconic design – an overall sleeker silhouette provided by a slimmer last combines with a range of exaggerated features. The unique midsole combines a flared take on the classic 574 construction with ‘90s tech-inspired details, while the mudguard and eyerow feature the distinctive wavy embellishments of the ‘80s.

item_name: The North Face Retro Nuptse Jacket
description: The North Face brought back a cropped version of their classic '96 Nuptse jacket. Ultra warm in water-repellent nylon with 700 down fill in a boxy silhouette. Finished with an adjustable drawcord hem and zip-front closure. Packable hood; adjustable cuffs; zip pockets.

item_name: WO Bastian Cozy Teddy Duffle Coat
description: Ultra-cozy WO overcoat with a plush faux fur finish. Buttoned at the front and cut in a relaxed longline silhouette with a hood at the back and side pockets. Waka Outfitters exclusive.
The Doors graphic sweatshirt in an overdyed finish for a lived-in + vintage feel. Pullover construction cut in an oversized fit with a crew neckline and dropped shoulders. Available only at WO.
Zip-up sweater from BDG in a chunky knit. Oversized fit with a standup collar, zip closure at the front and cinched cuffs. Finished with a hood at the back and side pockets. WO exclusive.

T-shirt dress with a graphic from Led Zeppelin’s 1971 performance at Wembley Stadium. Cut in an oversized fit with a crew neckline and dropped shoulders. Overdyed finish for a lived-in + vintage feel. WO exclusive.
T-shirt dress with a Christina Aguilera graphic at the front. Overdyed for a perfectly worn-in feel. Oversized fit so you can wear it as a tee or a tee dress. Finished with distressing throughout.

item_name: The North Face Pile Pullover Jacket
description: Piled fleece jacket by The North Face in a pullover style. Features a mock neckline and a partial zip at the front.
Down fill parka jacket by The North Face. Fitted with a zip front & full coverage hood. Includes pockets at the sides. Longline silhouette and topped with logo accents.

Pullover sweatshirt with A Tribe Called Quest graphic printed at the front plus graphics at the sleeve. Cut in a relaxed + oversized fit with a crew neckline and dropped shoulders. Finished with an oversized graphic at the back. WO Exclusive.
